Source.Name: pylibacl
Source.Summary: This python 2.2+ extension module allows you to manipulate the POSIX.1e Access Control Lists present in some os/filesystem combinations.
Source.Description: This python 2.2+ extension module allows you to manipulate the POSIX.1e Access Control Lists present in some os/filesystem combinations.
Source.Summary: POSIX.1e Access Control Listelerini manüple eden bir python 2.2+ eklentisi.
Source.Description: POSIX.1e Access Control Listelerini manüple eden bir python 2.2+ eklentisi.
